title: Barred from PBE?
body: I've been using the PBE for 4-5 years now, with the same two accounts. Now, the game tells me that both are inactive. I wish to test out the assassin reworks, and I know it hasn't been more than 6 months since I've played a match on the PBE. I've been seeing some posts about an opt-in for the PBE... but I was one of the original approved testers. The accounts are not linked to any live account, as that was not a condition beforehand.

replies.body: I wasn't able to locate a PBE account from the account you are posting from, so I can't verify if you already have a PBE account activated or not.  Legacy (really old) PBE accounts were deactivated, and those testers had an opportunity to opt-in and activate current accounts attached to their live account.  You can reach out to us individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can see if you have a PBE account active.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
